extDescription.message: オーディオの保存が簡単になりました！ Vkやその他のお気に入りのオーディオリソースから音楽を高速ダウンロードします。

extName.message: Music Saver - 音楽ダウンロード

textNotAvailableContent.message: So decided the musician or his representative.

titleHideBitrate.message: Show bitrate and size when hovering to audio

titleSaveFolderDesc.message: All paths to folders are relative folders for downloads. Leave the field blank, if you do not want the files to be downloaded to subfolders

titleShowBitrate.message: Do not show bitrate and size
